name: Davidoff - Small Batch - Verano
additionalNotes: Davidoff Small Batch Cigars are a collection of limited-run cigars made with different tobacco blends and only available in limited quantities. Each Small Batch cigar from Davidoff was released in different quantities and are named after a number (1, 2, 3, 4, 7, 8, 11, 12, & 16) and come packaged in paper bundles of five or ten cigars.
